text: Grand Prairie is a city in Dallas County, Tarrant County, Ellis County in the state of Texas. It is a rather big city with a population of 196,100 people in 2020. Grand Prairie is part of a bigger region known as the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex made up of Dallas and Fort Worth and their suburbs or cities outside of them. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Grand Prairie Category:Cities in Dallas County, Texas Category:Settlements in Tarrant County, Texas
title: Grand Prairie, Texas
